answers.text: You will have access to programmatic case management capability (API).
You can get contextual (to your use-case) architectural guidance from AWS.
If your system is impaired you will get a response from AWS within 12 business hours.
If your system is impaired you will get a response from AWS within 6 business hours.
You will get Interoperability & configuration guidance and troubleshooting for third-party software.
You will get general architectural guidance.

text: Which of the following is true for the AWS Developer Support Plan?
